file_content.text: [You open Reki's treatise on Ord Mantell's exotic birds and are instantly bored by the dull text entries.]
I sure hope that cipher works....
There has to be a less boring way to do this.
I became starship captain so I wouldn't have to do homework....
[You quickly use the cipher Reki taught you to uncover the schematics hidden within the text.]
[The schematics show a door in Reki's basement that opens onto an area outside the perimeter walls.]
[A pathway leads down the hill to a maintenance passage leading into the separatist hideout's lower level.]
[The separatist computer station is under heavy guard, but they won't expect attackers coming from the back door.]
